title: Brahma Kumaris
summary:
The Brahma Kumaris are a spiritual movement that originated in Hyderabad, Sindh, during the 1930s.[1]
The Brahma Kumaris (Sanskrit: ब्रह्माकुमारी, "Daughters of Brahma"[2][3]) movement was founded by Lekhraj Kripalani. The organisation is known for the prominent role that women play in the movement.[4]
